TopicTitle: [1.0.5] [RELEASE 0.8] Sido's Urania System : 7 new planets and 8 moons !

Articles.Content:
@ Learwin and Augustus I downloaded a cfg file posted by someone else on this mod post. Vararo said this! Thank him! Here it is;

Which EVE version which KSP(0.24 and 64bit)version ? Because everytime i install this i don`t even get clouds on Kerbin but EVE is installed. :/

Edited September 2, 2014 by Learwin
The cfgs in the original download are written against an old version of EVE. EVE changed its cfg format.

@ Learwin and Augustus I downloaded a cfg file posted by someone else on this mod post. Vararo said this! Thank him! Here it is;

1.Download and install EVE from http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/...umetricClouds! as usual.

3. Download and install Urania as usual, STOP WHEN YOU GO TO COPY THE CLOUD DIRECTORY!

3. Open the Cloud Directory from the Uranaia Download.

4. Open the BoulderCo Directory in your GameData folder.

5. ONLY copy over the following files- erato_clouds, Hecate_clouds, hermes_clouds, hestia_clouds, hyperion_1, hyperion_2, rhea_clouds, snow.

6 Download this .cf file https://www.dropbox.com/sh/l5me0eyhz...ers-Urania.cfg

7.Place the coudlayer-Urania in your Clouds Directory.

8. ???

9. Profit!

i have installed it, but i stuck cause of step numb. 6 - can't download it!!!

Hello, fellows! I wanted to tell you, that I'm trying to fix the Urania Addon's clouds and the Planetfactorys Science ^^ And I'm going to upload some kind of status update about this today or tomorrow. When I've completly finished everything I'm gonna upload some kind of modpack which you just need to copy and paste I'll be posting a link or the video later in here, so you can tell me what you think about Urania now ^^ (It's some kind of pink/purple, mixed with white and blue)

Hello, fellows!
